quote: Sometimes you deal with the devil not because you want to, but because if you don't, someone else will.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Cerulean Sins

quote: Got it. Demon. Death. Doom.
author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Creatures

quote: We may have done what the devil said we did, but we are NOT who the devil says we are!
author: April Cofield Essix,  From Crack to Christ: A Witness

quote: Boy, you knock on the devil's door and he will head slam you through the wall.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  No Mercy

quote: We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: As far as God goes, I _am_ a nonbeliever. Still am. But when it comes to a devil---well, that's something else.
author: William Peter Blatty,  The Exorcist

quote: The truth is, the Devil's job is easy.
author: Tyler Edwards,  Zombie Church: Breathing Life Back Into the Body of Christ

quote: The devil's happy when the critics run you off.
author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms

quote: A working knowledge of the devil can be very well had from resisting him.
author: Flannery O'Connor,  The Habit of Being: Letters of Flannery O'Connor

quote: Becuse God loves us, but the devil takes an interest.
author: Jennifer Donnelly,  Revolution

quote: Good and Evil To have good and evil the Devil must always remain a step beyond saving.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The soul is an irrational, indivisible equation that perfectly expresses one thing: you. The soul would be no good to the devil if it could be destroyed. And it is not lost when placed in Satan's care, as is so often said. He always know exactly how to put his finger on it.
author: Joe Hill,  Horns

quote: I have the feeling we just made a deal with the devil, and he's going to come back and want our first-born child or something."Daemon waggled his brows. "You want kids? Because you know, practice makes--""Shut up."I shook my head and started walking.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Opal

quote: Man is a demon, man is a god. Both true.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quote: The devil can be a clown of prizes in moments like these. Moments of knowing you’ve ventured too far down the wrong path and all you can do is accept more prizes ...
author: J.M. August

quote: We don't know the Devil's side of the story, because God wrote all the books.
author: J.A. Konrath,  Origin

quote: People who cease to believe in God or goodness altogether still believe in the devil... Evil is always possible. And goodness is eternally difficult.
author: Anne Rice,  Interview with the Vampire

quote: We have never heard the devil's side of the story, God wrote all the book.
author: Anatole France

quote: All the cunning of the devil is exercised in trying to tear us away from the word.
author: Martin Luther

quote: You're gonna have to serve somebody; well, it may be the devil, or it may be the Lord, but you're gonna have to serve somebody...
author: Bob Dylan

quote: One never knows how the witch became wicked, or whether that was the right choice for her — is it ever the right choice? Does the devil ever struggle to be good again, or if so is he not a devil? It is the very least question of definitions.
author: Gregory Maguire,  Wicked: The Life and Times of the Wicked Witch of the West

quote: A poet is not an apostle; he drives out devils only by the power of the devil.
author: Søren Kierkegaard,  Fear And Trembling / Repetition

quote: God sends meat and the devil sends cooks.
author: Thomas Deloney

quote: Inevitably it follows that anyone with an independent mind must become 'one who resists or opposes an authority or established convention': a rebel. ...And if enough people come to agree with—and follow—the REBEL, we now have a DEVIL. Until, of course, still more people agree. And then, finally, we have ... GREATNESS.
author: Nicholas Tharcher,  Rebels and Devils: The Psychology of Liberation

quote: Faith has won it! Fear has lost it! When you get full of faith, the devil gets filled with fear! Keep your faith in light every day and you will keep the devil in fright always!
author: Israelmore Ayivor,  The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: Ultimately a hero is a man who would argue with the gods, and so awakens devils to contest his vision. The more a man can achieve, the more he may be certain that the devil will inhabit a part of his creation.
author: Norman Mailer

quote: Worshiping the Devil is no more insane than worshiping God...It is precisely at the moment when positivism is at its high-water mark that mysticism stirs into life and the follies of occultism begin.
author: Joris-Karl Huysmans

quote: If the universe does consist of a battle between the devil and God, the final analysis should conclude that religion would have been the devil’s most brilliant move and science, God’s.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quote: Words are directed to your personalities namely; - God, your hearers, devil and yourself.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten.
author: Hunter S. Thompson,  Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas

quote: The best way to drive out the devil, if he will not yield to texts of Scripture, is to jeer and flout him, for he cannot bear scorn.
author: Martin Luther

quote: It is wonderful how much time good people spend fighting the devil. If they would only expend the same amount of energy loving their fellow men, the devil would die in his own tracks of ennui.
author: Helen Keller,  The Story of My Life

quote: Finaly, my brethren, be strong in the Lord and in the power of His might. Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. -Ephesians 6:10-11
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: The New King James Version

quote: If money’s the god people worship, I’d rather go worship the devil instead.
author: Jess C. Scott,  Rockstar

quote: A book is a product of a pact with the Devil that inverts the Faustian contract, he'd told Allie. Dr Faustus sacrificed eternity in return for two dozen years of power; the writer agrees to the ruination of his life, and gains (but only if he's lucky) maybe not eternity, but posterity, at least. Either way (this was Jumpy's point) it's the Devil who wins.
author: Salman Rushdie,  The Satanic Verses

quote: I suppose sooner or later in the life of everyone comes a moment of trial. We all of us have our particular devil who rides us and torments us, and we must give battle in the end.
author: Daphne du Maurier,  Rebecca

quote: God never talks. But the devil keeps advertising, Father. The devil does a lot of commercials.
author: William Peter Blatty,  The Exorcist

quote: Hell is empty and all the devils are here.
author: William Shakespeare,  The Tempest

quote: I have no doubt at all the Devil grins,As seas of ink I spatter. Ye gods, forgive my "literary"sins --The other kind don't matter.
author: Robert W. Service,  Rhymes of a Rolling Stone

quote: But here steps in Satan, the eternal rebel, the first freethinker and the emancipator of worlds. He makes man ashamed of his bestial ignorance and obedience; he emancipates him, stamps upon his brow the seal of liberty and humanity, in urging him to disobey and eat of the fruit of knowledge.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: But here steps in Satan, the eternal rebel, the first freethinker and the emancipator of worlds. He makes man ashamed of his bestial ignorance and obedience; he emancipates him, stamps upon his brow the seal of liberty and humanity, in urging him to disobey and eat of the fruit of knowledge.
author: Bakunin, Mikhail Aleksandrovich

quote: The devil, darkness, and death may swagger and boast, the pangs of life will sting for a while longer, but don't worry; the forces of evil are breathing their last. Not to worry...He's risen!
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Until an hour before the Devil fell, God thought him beautiful in Heaven.
author: Arthur Miller,  The Crucible

quote: The fallen angel becomes a malignant devil. Yet even that enemy of God and man had friends and associates in his desolation; I am alone.
author: Mary Shelley,  Frankenstein

quote: I would rather be a devil in alliance with truth, than an angel in alliance with falsehood.
author: Ludwig Feuerbach,  The Essence of Christianity

quote: Each of us has a vulnerability like Edmund's that Satan is eager to exploit. It may be something addictive like drugs or alcohol, or it may be something seemingly harmless and perhaps even good like food, friendship, or work.
author: Discovery House Publishers

quote: This life is for loving, sharing, learning, smiling, caring, forgiving, laughing, hugging, helping, dancing, wondering, healing, and even more loving. I choose to live life this way. I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, 'aw shit, he's up!
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Who knew that the devil had a factory where he made millions of fossils, which his minions distributed throughout the earth, in order to confuse my tiny brain?
author: Lewis Black,  Me of Little Faith
